data.message: What up bro you aint no devil im Crewsfx aka Jesus and you are one of my archangels and so is Snoop let him know and both you friend me i get the greatest bud on earth moon rocks for 1400/ pound lets make a killin bro ive developed Thor and Hulk and they make yoy feel like both i am Thor lets chill look at my page itll blow your mind im Jesus Christ or Crewsfx Sanders you are a ram not a devil you are one of my 12 kings and i am the King of kings
